titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate concerning support for a change in United States Golf Association rules on the use of carts by disabled individuals in the sanctioned tournaments play of that organization.

action.text: Submitted in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent. Until the close of business July 15, 1987.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/10/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the United States Golf Association be encouraged to consider nondiscriminatory flexibility in its rules to allow qualified disabled individuals to compete in tournaments.
